LanguageData.NoMoreImpassableTiles.OverrideWorldPathf: Enable to allow movement through impassable tiles.
LanguageData.NoMoreImpassableTiles.AllowImpassableSet: Enable to allow settlements to be founded in impassable tiles (biome permitting).
LanguageData.NoMoreImpassableTiles.MiningSiteAllowImp: Allow Mining Sites to Spawn In Impassable Tiles (Requires Ideology)
Enable to allow mining sites to spawn in impossible tiles (biome permitting). (Requires Ideology)
LanguageData.NoMoreImpassableTiles.Debug.Tooltip: Enable to print debug output to Player.log, including Harmony patch output.
